Player History
Hit for the cycle against San Francisco on 4/26/1965...
Injured on 9/17/1965 with a Bruised Ulna, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/28/1966 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2-3 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1968, hitting .391 with 9 HR, 30 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/4/1968, off Jim Rittwage (SF)...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago (N), driving in 8 runs on 8/29/1968...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis on 6/9/1969 (Going to STL: CF F. Robinson. Going to CIN: RF M. Easler, P D. Baney)...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 7/17/1970...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Philadelphia on 7/24/1970...
Injured on 8/15/1970 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/2/1971 to a 1-year deal worth $9,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1971, hitting .517 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1971, hitting .390 with 7 HR, 29 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/5/1972 to a 1-year deal worth $9,000,000 per year...
Released by Pittsburgh on 2/6/1972...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/8/1972 to a 1-year deal worth $4,122,452 per year...
